anthracnose.name: Anthracnose
anthracnose.symptoms: Symptoms of anthracnose diseases range from minor, cosmetic spotting of leaves, to blighting of leaves and tender shoots, to dieback of twigs and branches. Symptoms also vary with the individual host and the causal fungus.
anthracnose.favourable_conditions: Leaves remaining wet for more than a few hours, cool conditions (10°C - 20°C).

cercospora_leaf_spot.name: Cercospora Leaf Spot
cercospora_leaf_spot.symptoms: Symptoms of Cercospora leaf spot first appear as individual, circular spots that are tan to light brown with reddish purple borders. As the disease progresses, individual spots coalesce. Heavily infected leaves first become yellow and eventually turn brown and necrotic.

cladosporium_leaf_spot.name: Cladosporium Leaf Spot
cladosporium_leaf_spot.symptoms: Early leaf spots are tan colored, and expand to 1-3mm in diameter. Adjacent spots may coalesce, forming irregular lesions. As the disease develops, velvety dark green-brown sporulation develops within the lesions.
cladosporium_leaf_spot.favourable_conditions: Cool conditions (10°C - 20°C) with high humidity. Disease is seed borne.

downy_mildew.name: Downy Mildew
downy_mildew.pathogen: Funguslike organisms of the phylum Oomycota
downy_mildew.symptoms: Downy mildew causes light green to yellow angular spots on the upper surfaces of leaves. The white fluffy growth of the pathogen develops on the lower sides of these spots. With time these lesions turn brown and dry up. Older leaves are attacked first. Severely infected leaves may die.
downy_mildew.favourable_conditions: Cool (10°C - 20°C) conditions, free water on the leaves.

stemphylium_leaf_spot.name: Stemphylium Leaf Spot
stemphylium_leaf_spot.pathogen: Stemphylium botryosum, Stemphylium sp and S. beticola.
stemphylium_leaf_spot.symptoms: Symptoms of Stemphylium leaf spot on leaves consist of small (0.13 to 0.25 cm diameter), circular to oval, gray-green leaf spots. As the disease progresses, leaf spots enlarge, remain circular to oval in shape, and turn tan in color. Older spots coalesce, dry up, and become papery in texture
stemphylium_leaf_spot.favourable_conditions: Prolonged periods of leaf wetness when temperatures are moderate (17°C - 23°C). Frequent rains.
